title: Revert landing page header branding to previous (remove broken Butterfly image)

requirements.text: Revert the landing page header branding in `frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx` to what it was before the Butterfly Wellness wordmark change, since the header image is not displaying. Specifically, remove the header `` that references `/assets/branding/butterfly-wellness-wordmark.png` and restore the previous SHAMMAH header branding (text-based, not dependent on the missing image), while keeping the existing header layout (left branding, right Sign In button).

quotes: The image is not showing so just replace it with what was previously there

acceptanceCriteria: On the Landing page, the header no longer attempts to load `/assets/branding/butterfly-wellness-wordmark.png`.
The header branding renders reliably (no broken image icon) and matches the previous SHAMMAH branding style (text-based).
The Sign In button remains visible and functional, with no layout regression in the header.

constraints: Frontend files under `frontend/src/components/ui` must not be edited; compose them only.
Do not modify any files listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`).
Backend is single-actor Motoko; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Do not implement any of the pending new feature requests in `project_state.json` (trackers, finance, body map, etc.).
Do not add new authentication providers (Google/Microsoft remain 'Coming Soon').
Do not redesign the landing page beyond reverting the header branding change.
